feed.title: Ente Auth Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v3.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [auth] don't use privacy screen for desktop by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2680

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v3.1.0...auth-v3.1.1

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v3.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2746
  • [mob][auth] local_auth upgrade & work around for new applock key by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2752
  • [mob][auth] Option to add pin/passcode without having a system lock by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2738
  • [mob][auth] Update flutter submodule to use v3.24.0 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2778
  • [mob][auth] Change dialog copy by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2796

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v3.1.2-beta...auth-v3.1.3

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v4.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [auth][l10n] Added Ukrainian translation by @stro in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2806
  • [auth] Updated Kraken icon by @nikunjkumarnakum in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2763
  • [Auth] Add HuggingFace icon by @shmshd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2827
  • [auth] Fix import errors by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2862
  • [Auth] Adjust icons by @ludespeedny in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2831
  • [Auth] Optimize and improve icons by @shmshd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2843
  • [auth] Add wealthsimple icon by @JamesS-M in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2882
  • [auth] Added FritzBox to custom-icons.json by @SpeeterYT in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2795
  • [auth][icons] Add T-Mobile, Wealthfront, and BinanceUS icon by @casualsailo in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2916
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2915
  • [auth] fix scaling of text in code widget, etc by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2873
  • [auth] Add Bethesda Softworks icon by @Zer1an in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2930
  • [auth] Add & change icons by @Eseltwift in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2954
  • [auth] Fix Aegis import without group by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2953
  • [auth] Fix #2018 by @Eseltwift in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2999
  • [auth] Add Upstox icon by @Eseltwift in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3033
  • [auth] Performance improvement to reduce CPU utlization by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3055
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3091
  • [auth] Refactor, clean and add icons by @Eseltwift in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3063
  • [auth] Request focus on the search box when clicked the search icon by @louislam in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3006
  • [auth] Fix & add icons by @Eseltwift in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3097
  • [auth] bump target sdk version by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3102
  • auth update podfile lock by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3130 om/ente-io/ente/pull/3176
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3173
  • [auth] Change PayPal logo to the new one by @Eseltwift in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3170
  • [auth] Add Appbar Lock Icon for Manual App Locking on Desktop + fix bugs by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3108
  • [auth] Added Capacities logo to icons and to custom-icons.json by @legomstr1 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3198
  • [auth] Fix rendering issue by @kishan-dhankecha in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3230
  • [Auth] Add icon for GOV.UK by @bsian03 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3132
  • [AUTH] Made dart analyzer happy by @kishan-dhankecha in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3226
  • [auth] Fix duplicate tags entry by @kishan-dhankecha in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3243
  • [mob][auth] Bump up auth to v3.1.4 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3248
  • [auth] Fix: uriEncdoe issuer name by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3252
  • [auth][web] Display shared codes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3257
  • [auth] Trash, Notes, Compact Mode, & Sharing by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3258
  • [auth] Add workflow for internal release by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3259
  • [auth] Bump version by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3260
  • [auth] Minor improvements by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3269
  • [auth] Minor improvements to the sharing page by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3270
  • [auth] Remove nesting for notes by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3271
  • [auth]: use correct value for compact mode in code widget by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3276
  • [auth] replace slidable with bottom sheet by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3275
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3285
  • [auth] Update coach screen by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3300
  • [mob][auth] Upgrade flutter v3.24.3 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3307
  • [auth] Reduce code sharing duration + minor fixes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3308
  • [auth] Change ordering for menu items by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3309
  • [cli] Add support for exporting Ente authenticator codes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3328
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3335
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3336
  • [auth] Bump version v3.1.8 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3337
  • [cli] Bump version by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3339
  • [infra] Use JAVA 17 for auth release workflow by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3340
  • [auth] Bump auth version by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3341

New Contributors

  • @stro made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2806
  • @JamesS-M made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2882
  • @SpeeterYT made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2795
  • @casualsailo made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2916
  • @Zer1an made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2930
  • @araghon007 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2955
  • @louislam made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3006
  • @legomstr1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3198
  • @kishan-dhankecha made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3230
  • @tobiasge made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3251

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v3.1.3...auth-v4.0.0

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v4.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [auth] Add onPressed color for Custom Keyboard in App Lock by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3361
  • [auth][l10n]: Add Bulgarian translation by @Crea7orX in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3402
  • [auth] Minor fixes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3403
  • Update auth faq.md by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3415
  • [auth] Make compact mode default & minor fixes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3416
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3414
  • [auth] Request authentication to view passkeys by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3424
  • [auth] Added and updated icons by @cgmccurdy in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3419
  • [AUTH] Replace Icon for bybit.com by @zDqrK404 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3279
  • [auth] Minor improvements by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3443

New Contributors

  • @Crea7orX made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3402
  • @cgmccurdy made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3419
  • @zDqrK404 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3279

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v4.0.0...auth-v4.0.1

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v4.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Format 7/8/9 digit codes
  • Fixed bug in handling account Name with colon character.
  • Increased the frequency to refresh code on UI
  • Pulled latest icons form simple-icons repo

Ref https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3455

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v4.0.1...auth-v4.0.2
